author: Esmay Rosalyne
description:
When I tell you that To Touch a Silent Fury had me in an absolute chokehold, I mean that I burned through 300+ pages in a single day, stayed up too late to finish it, and then (lovingly) cursed R.A. Sandpiper for the brutal emotional rollercoaster that she just put me through. This is just […]

The post REVIEW: To Touch a Silent Fury by R. A. Sandpiper appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: To Touch a Silent Fury by R. A. Sandpiper
